description: This file defines the StringUtils object which provides utility functions for string manipulation, specifically join and split operations leveraging other utility classes.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A singleton object providing string utility functions for joining and splitting strings.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Joins elements of a LinkedList into a single String using JoinUtils.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList using SplitUtils.
